name: Bilanc
headline: AI-powered Engineering Management
description: An AI-Powered Engineering Management Platform. Track engineering velocity, summarise every PR and Release, and draft performance reviews & team briefings.

founders.name: Samuel Akinwunmi, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CEO of Bilanc (YC W24). Love cats, music, and data.

generated_description:
### Bilanc Overview

Bilanc is a fresh entrant in the tech landscape, having been founded in 2023 as a part of the Y Combinator Batch W24. Located in the vibrant hub of London, UK, the company operates with a lean team of two. Their mission? Transforming engineering management through AI.

### What Does Bilanc Do?

Bilanc is designed to supercharge engineering teams. It provides an AI-powered platform that tracks engineering velocity, summarizes pull requests (PRs) and releases, and even drafts performance reviews and team briefings. Essentially, it uses large language models (LLMs) to analyze outputs from engineers to deliver actionable insights, thereby enhancing productivity.

### Key Features

- **AI-Powered Analysis**: Understands and quantifies engineering performance.
- **Team Summaries**: Delivers concise overviews to keep everyone on the same page.
- **Performance Reviews**: Helps streamline the review process with data-backed insights.

### Why Bilanc Stands Out

Bilanc's offering is tagged with keywords like SaaS, B2B, analytics, and DevOps, highlighting its focus on leveraging software to improve business operations in engineering environments. As we see the growing integration of AI in business processes, Bilanc positions itself as a crucial tool for companies looking to optimize their engineering workflows.

### Who‚Äôs Behind Bilanc?

Nicolas Dessaigne serves as the Group Partner, bringing a wealth of experience and vision to the startup. With a talented and small team, Bilanc is equipped to innovate in the engineering management space.

### Getting Started

Want to see Bilanc in action? They offer the ability to book a demo on their website. The platform promises to unlock engineering excellence, making it an intriguing option for any technical organization looking to improve efficiency and team cohesion. 

In essence, Bilanc is not just another tool; it's a potential game-changer for teams striving to maximize their engineering output through intelligent management. 

For more information, visit their website at [Bilanc.co](https://www.bilanc.co).
